message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $95. I think you'll find it's a great deal!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to go up to $87. Can you meet me there?
